content: use 12 single_crochet in each st around 13 increase 4 single_crochet x 3 24 single_crochet= 42 14-18 single_crochet in each st around 19 decrease 12 single_crochet x 3= 39 20 decrease 11 single_crochet x 3= 36 21 single_crochet in each st around now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it sweet oddity art 3 fish head and body continued 22 decrease 10 single_crochet x 3= 33 23 decrease 9 single_crochet x 3= 30 24-26 single_crochet in each st around 27 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 28-30 single_crochet in each st around 31 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 32-33 single_crochet in each st around 34 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 35 single_crochet in each st around now you are making the tail fold the opening half single_crochet the opening closed 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 2 chain 1 turn increase 4 single_crochet increase= 8 3 chain 1 turn increase 6 single_crochet increase= 10 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 5 chain 1 turn increase 8 single_crochet increase= 12 6 chain 1 turn increase 10 single_crochet increase= 14 7 chain 1 turn increase 12 single_crochet increase= 16 sweet oddity art 4 fish head and body continued 8 chain 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain treble_crochet in last chain slip_stitch in same st 4 single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain slip_stitch in same st 4 single_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain treble_crochet in last chain slip_stitch in same st 4 single_crochet chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in last chain slip_stitch in same st 3 single_crochet f/o and weave in the tail end teeth make 2 front teeth with color c with color c 1 make 3 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 3 chain 8 2 increase 2 single_crochet= 4 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 7 3 single_crochet in each st around 2 *chain 3 turn slip_stitch in same st single_crochet in next 4 increase single_crochet x 2= 6 2 st* repeat from * to * across do not stuff the teeth f/o and leave a long tail for
